title: Possession (Reese & Finch slash - Person of Interest)
author: strawberrybisque2
comment: Your video got me smiling, great job!
I love this slash. Reese and Finch are so HOT damned ;)
"The bed scenes are obviously not from the show".         Such a pity cause I'd pay good money to see that!  Great Rinch vid!!!  Thanks for posting!
description: Finally got one of my in progress 'Person of Interest' videos done. Hooray! This one is an AU, slash vid pairing Reese & Finch so if me making them gay offends you then skip this one. The video is from John's point of view and the song tells the story. Finch is Reese's 'possession'. The bed scenes are obviously not from the show...
